thread.title: Eric and Lara Trump Announce They’re Having a Baby Boy
thread.title_full: Eric and Lara Trump Announce They’re Having a Baby Boy

author: Wilmot Proviso
title: Eric and Lara Trump Announce They’re Having a Baby Boy
text:
Rush: Comey’s Message to Trump Is to Stop With That “Drain the Swamp” Stuff 
“We are blessed!” they added. . @LaraLeaTrump & I are excited to announce that we are adding a boy to #TeamTrump in September. It's been an amazing year. We are blessed! pic.twitter.com/ENrhdxdziA 
— Eric Trump (@EricTrump) March 20, 2017 
“We found out on my birthday, which was pretty cool,” the 33-year-old son of the president told People .   
Lara Trump, also 33, is a former producer for “Inside Edition.” She says that while she “was exhausted in the beginning,” she’s feeling better now that she’s in the second trimester. 
“It surprised me, because I’m a very active person, and until the fatigue hit, I didn’t believe it would actually happen to me,” she said. “It really affected me. But I’m feeling really good now.” 
While the baby will be Eric and Lara’s first, it definitely won’t be Trump’s first grandchild. In fact, the president already has eight . And his siblings’ children have all been good practice for Eric’s parenting skills. 
“Eric’s going to be an amazing dad,” Lara says. “The nieces and nephews love hanging with him. He’s the cool uncle. He’s watched ‘Frozen’ many times.”
